FAQ's

Shopware SaaS, PaaS, or self-hosted? What is the right solution for my business?

Shopware SaaS(software as a service) andShopware PaaS(platform as a service) are both ecommerce solutions in the cloud. This means youre free to focus on your core business while we take care of the hosting. With Shopware Cloud you get everything you need to build your online store with maximum efficiency and start growing from day one. In many respects, Shopware SaaS and Shopware PaaS share the same advantages, but there are also salient differences:

Shopware SaaS

  • Automatic software updates

  • Carefree hosting and infrastructure maintenance

  • Full control over your resources

  • Scaling mechanism and full expandability

Shopware PaaS

  • All benefits from Shopware SaaS, as well as:

  • Maximum customizability

  • Performance monitoring

  • Dev tools to test and create efficient processes

Self-hostedis the right solution for your business if you have an expert developer team by your side and you need full control over your chosen IT infrastructure.

  • Hosted on your own server or your chosen hosting provider

  • Extensive customization options

  • Custom programming possible

  • Local storage of data

And the costs?Shopware SaaScomes at the same price asself-hosted, thus providing you more value for money. AsShopware PaaSis tailored to your specific needs, we offer you individualized pricing for it. Please contact us for further information.

Which plan is the best solution for my business?

It depends on your specific needs. Are you already a global player with comprehensive B2C or B2B requirements? Or are you an ambitious new merchant with a long-term business plan? How fast do you want to grow? What type of support do you need? Lets discuss your business goals with a personal consultation and find the right Shopware plan for your current and future needs.Contact our team directly.

How is the price of the Shopware plans calculated?

The pricing for our plans is based on your gross merchandise value (GMV) and further individual factors. Our sales experts will be happy to explain all the details in a personal consultation with you.

How do I find a Shopware partner agency to work with?

With over 1,200 certified Shopware agencies that specialize in a variety of services, you can be confident youll find right support for your specific requirements. Find the right agency for your businesshere.

I'm currently using a different ecommerce solution. How can I migrate?

Easy - we'll bring you over! Our support team as well as our specialized partner agencies will help you migrate your business smoothly and ensure you keep all your important assets such as customer data, order history, products, etc.Find further information here.

Can I get any assistance in addition to the official Shopware support?

Of course you can! Because as an open source platform, we involve our global community of business leaders, developers, and partner agencies on a daily basis:

  • Chat with over 6,000 users on our Discord channel

  • Find support and current discussions on the Stack Overflow platform. Use the platform to ask technical questions or share your knowledge

  • Gain insights from free training videos

  • Join the free Shopware workshops for developers

  • Grow and learn with the community on our Boost Days

Please also visit ourdocumentation, thecommunity forum, and theacademy.

Does Shopware offer a free ecommerce solution?

Yes, the Community Edition is the open source, MIT-licensed core of Shopware that can be downloaded and used for free.

What is the difference between our paid plans and the free Community Edition?

All our paid plans are expanding upon the Community Edition, adding cutting-edge features thatll make your business stand out from the competition and speed up your success. Also, with our paid plans you get support directly from Shopware, accelerating the implementation of your ecommerce project.

The Community Edition of Shopware is supported through voluntary work by people from our pioneering community. It is not available in the Shopware Cloud setup and maintenance are your responsibility.

Our Community Edition is the heart of Shopware. It is the foundation of your success, while our paid plans are the accelerators that will take your business above and beyond.

Read more about our open sourceCommunity Edition.

Still have more questions? Learn more in our Help Center or contact sales.
